title: Anton Amelchenko
text: Anton Amelchenko ( (Anton Amelchanka); ; born 27 March 1985 in <a href="Gomel">Gomel</a>) is a former <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian international <a href="association%20football">football</a>er. He earned several caps for <a href="Belarus%20national%20football%20team">Belarus national side</a> between 2007 and 2011.
